entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Alexandria
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:03 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.8°C

entry.title: Thursday: Ice pellets mixed with snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Ice pellets or snow mixed with freezing rain beginning early this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with freezing rain changing to rain this evening. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers in the morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
